text: @realDonaldTrump You SOO DID ignore it. Your acquittal was Feb 5. You held four political rallies & had a Florida golf vacation between that date and Feb 27, you claimed coronavirus will go away on its own “like a miracle.” You never preordered PPE and ventilators before too late. True facts.
